import{getAuth,createUserWithEmailAndPassword}from"firebase/auth";import{projectAuth}from"../../firebase/config";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Signup(){const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[error,setError]=useState(null);const auth=getAuth(projectAuth.app);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError(null);try{const userCredential=await createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password);console.log("Signed Up User:",userCredential.user);}catch(err){console.error("Error during sign up:",err.code,err.message);setError(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.container,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:styles.title,children:"Sign Up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:styles.form,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"What's your email?",className:styles.input,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),value:email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password?",className:styles.input,onChange:p=>setPassword(p.target.value),value:password}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:styles.button,children:"Sign Up"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error})]})]});}
